DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe flu vaccine coverage in children under 18 years of age and to examine correlations between in-office flu vaccine coverage and the use of various tactics to increase vaccine coverage.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Describe Pediatric Influenza Vaccine Coverage
DOC.detailed_description: To describe influenza vaccine coverage in children less than 18 years of age in practicing pediatricians' offices and family medicine physicians' offices and to examine correlations between in-office influenza vaccine coverage and the use of various tactics to increase vaccine coverage.
DOC.criteria: Sites selected to participate were required to be able to accurately identify the number of patients under their care by age group and provide influenza vaccine at their location.
